name: 萨拉·拉弗勒尔
name_full: 萨拉·拉弗勒尔 Sarah Lafleur

last_movies.title: 慧眼女特工 第二季
美少女战士SS剧场版：九大水手战士集合！梦想黑洞的奇迹

introduction: Sarah Lafleur is a Canadian screen and voice actress, most recognizable for her roles in Ugly Betty (ABC), The Mentalist (CBS), Grey's Anatomy (ABC), CSI: NY (CBS), Crossing Jordan (NBC), Without a Trace (CBS), Playmakers (ESPN); and the films Shall We Dance? (Miramax), Master Spy: The Robert Hanssen Story (CBS) and Daydream Believers: The Monkees Story (VH1). She also narrated several seasons of My Fair Wedding with David Tutera (WEtv) and is the voice of Sailor Uranus for the first English version of Sailor Moon, Ansa Land Lock, and Trish in Devil May Cry. Lafleur was part of the year 2000 cast of History Bites (History Channel) nominated for a Gemini Award in the Best Performance by an Ensemble Cast in a Music, Variety Program category.
